citeinfo.title: Low-altitude remote sensing dataset of DEM and RGB mosaic for AB corridor on July 13 2013 and L2 corridor on July 21 2013

descript.abstract:
Low-altitude remote sensing dataset including DEM and RGB mosaic for AB transect and Site0-L2 corridor.
Processing flowchart for each corridor: Ground control points (GCP, 20.3 cm square white targets, every ~20 m) surveyed with RTK GPS. Acquisition of RGB pictures using a Kite-based platform. Structure from Motion based reconstruction using hundreds of pictures and GCP coordinates. Export of DEM and RGB mosaic in geotiff format (NAD 83, 2012 geoid, UTM zone 4 north) with pixel resolution of about 2 cm, and x,y,z accuracy in centimeter range (< 10 cm). High-accuracy and high-resolution inside GCPs zone for L2 corridor (500x20m), AB corridor (500x40) DEM will be updated as needed. Only zones between GCPs have <10 cm accuracy although all the mosaic is provided. Dataset DOI:10.5440/1177858; http://dx.doi.org/10.5440/1177858
descript.purpose: Data collected to identify interconnections between surface and subsurface properties on a time-lapse basis.

idinfo.useconst: No use constraints are associated with this data.
idinfo.datacred: John Peterson, Craig Ulrich, Susan Hubbard

tool.tooldesc: RGB JPEG files are processed using Agisoft Photoscan Version 1.0.4 build 1845 to produce the DEM and RGB mosaics

qattracc.attraccv: No formal uncertainty assessments were conducted and no estimates of uncertainty are reported.

dataqual.logic: Data are considered of good quality in the context of the information presented in the abstract. Users are advised to read the rest of the metadata record carefully for additional details.
dataqual.complete: Data are considered complete in the context of the information presented in the abstract. Users are advised to read the rest of the metadata record carefully for additional details.

method.methdesc: Processing flowchart for each corridor: Ground control points (GCP, 20.3 cm square white targets, every 20 m) surveyed with RTK GPS. Acquisition of RGB pictures using a Kite-based platform. Structure from Motion based reconstruction using hundreds of pictures and GCP coordinates. Export of DEM and RGB mosaic in geotiff format (NAD 83, 2012 geoid, UTM zone 4 north) with pixel resolution of about 2 cm, and x,y,z accuracy in centimeter range (< 10 cm). High-accuracy and high-resolution inside GCPs zone for L2 corridor (500x20m) and AB corridor (500x40). Only zones between GCPs are accurate although all the mosaic is provided.

cntperp.cntorg: Next-Generation Ecosystem Experiments (NGEE) Arctic Project, Oak Ridge National Laboratory

metainfo.metstdn: FDGC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata and Biological Data Profile
